document.full_text: bahrain's king hamad bin isa al-khalifa called for talks on reform involving all parties in the gulf arab state "without preconditions" from july 1, the state news agency said on tuesday.
document.title: bahrain's king offers july reform talks
lines_and_colors: bahrain's king hamad bin isa al-khalifa called for talks on reform involving all parties in the gulf arab state "without preconditions" from july 1, the state news agency said on tuesday.
